item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello there This is the first post of this blog and I would like to present myself: My name is Diogo Valério I’m a first year Computer Science student I live in Portugal I’m a hobbyist programmer Some programming languages that have caught my interest recently were rust and haskell. I’m very into functional programming. I’ve also messed a little with lisp and clojure. I’m a Linux power user and a FOSS advocate. I’m a PC gamer and I’m also interested in Game Development.
